meanings.definition: A suffix used to form nouns denoting a person who does something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher helps learn-ers in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The dancers are perform-ers in the show.
meanings.sent3: The bakers are the cake mak-ers in town.
meanings.sent4: She is the lead sing-ers in the band.
meanings.sent5: The builders are the house build-ers in the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form nouns denoting a person who is associated with or participates in a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: The players are the soccer play-ers on the field.
meanings.sent2: The swimmers are the pool div-ers in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The chefs are the food cook-ers at the restaurant.
meanings.sent4: He is the star perform-ers in the theater.
meanings.sent5: The artists are the paint-ers in the art gallery.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form nouns denoting a person who holds a particular office or rank.
meanings.sent1: The mayor is the city lead-ers in the town.
meanings.sent2: The captain is the team lead-ers on the field.
meanings.sent3: The president is the country lead-ers in the world.
meanings.sent4: She is the principal teach-ers at the school.
meanings.sent5: The CEO is the company manag-ers in the business.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form nouns denoting a person who is characterized by a particular quality or trait.
meanings.sent1: The winners are the victor-ers of the competition.
meanings.sent2: The helpers are the assist-ers in times of need.
meanings.sent3: The leaders are the guidance provid-ers in the community.
meanings.sent4: She is the kind-hearted help-ers to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The explorers are the adventur-ers in the unknown.
